div.p: SAT trend due to internal variability. Summer SAT decadal trends after decomposition [1961–2000; °C (dec) −1] from the total trends. It actually represents the internal climatic variability among the runs. The subplot in the top left corner represents member 1 and counting forward towards right. The maps in the figure are generated using the MATLAB software (Version: R2012b (8.0.0.783) & http://www.mathworks.com/products/matlab/?s_tid=srchtitle).
